meanings.definition: A male escort who is available for hire by phone.
meanings.sent1: The callboys arrived promptly at the hotel to accompany the guests to the event.
meanings.sent2: She hired a callboy to accompany her to the gala event.
meanings.sent3: The callboys made sure the guests felt comfortable and well taken care of throughout the evening.
meanings.sent4: The callboys were like personal assistants, ensuring everything ran smoothly for the guests.
meanings.sent5: The callboys' professionalism and charm left a lasting impression on the guests.

meanings.definition: A group of male stagehands who assist with the production of a play or performance.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the callboys swiftly moved the props on and off the stage.
meanings.sent2: The callboys worked behind the scenes to make the performance seamless.
meanings.sent3: The callboys joked around backstage, adding a fun energy to the production.
meanings.sent4: The callboys were the unsung heroes of the theater, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The callboys' teamwork and efficiency were crucial to the success of the play.
